prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass - no Piano - make up this song.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass - Piano is absent.

Style 3: This song is a mix of Reed, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass - Piano is not included.
